did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, legal and financial documents, and printed material.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, deeds and other legal documents, accounts, certificates, printed material, and miscellaneous papers of the Chatfield, Foster, and McCray families, mainly concerning the sale of land and lumber.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, deeds and other legal documents, accounts, certificates, printed material, and miscellaneous papers of the Chatfield, Foster, and McCray families, mainly concerning the sale of land and lumber.
